alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Macon; Randolph; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 11:55AM CDT until March 31 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in north central Missouri... Eastern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Saline County in central Missouri... South central Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brunswick, or 9 miles north of Slater, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salisbury, Huntsville, Keytesville, Gilliam, Clifton Hill, Dalton and Prairie Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Missouri.
